info.title: Mandelbrot for Wii
info.author: krupkat
info.details:
This is a Mandelbrot set generator, you could have seen them on other platforms as well e.g. FractInt for PC.

A - zoom
B - reset
-,+ - change palette
1,2 - change number of iterations
DOWN - run cycling palette
HOME - back to HBC

v1.3 - cycling palette
v1.2 - major speedup thanks to Dashxdr
v1.1 - wiimote friendly
